long_description: Sleek and laptop-ready, the REI Lode Daypack comfortably handles your daily essentials, whether you're a student, professional or world traveler. Main compartment has a sleeve that holds most 15.6 in. laptops; alternatively, the sleeve can hold a hydration reservoir. An inner mesh sleeve can hold most tablets; sleeve is positioned away from the pack edges for protection. Pack has 2 zip front pockets; one includes an organizer panel for pens, electronics and other small items. A mesh pocket on each side can hold a water bottle. Comfortable back panel has dual-density padding with ventilation channels; adjustable shoulder straps are padded and contoured. Finishing touches on the REI Lode Daypack include reflective trim, outer compression straps and strap keepers that secure the shoulder straps' webbing tails.
short_description: Sleek and laptop-ready, the REI Lode Daypack comfortably handles your daily essentials, whether you're a student, professional or world traveler.
